item.title: Exploring Rust - Part 1 (Setup: Atom, Racer)
item.description: Exploring Rust Everyone seems to be talking about Rust lately, so I’d thought I’d give it a shot and write something in it. The exploration begins with setting up the rust compiler (rustc), and setting up atom with various rust packages (linter, racer, and syntax highlighting). Environment Setup Installing the Rust Compiler (rustc) Fetch the latest stable rust binaries (As of writing this 1.17.0): $ curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh Rust comes with a language package manager called Cargo, I will be using it to install a package called racer for auto completion in atom.
